title: Usability Evaluation and Improvement Workshop for Communication Process Revealed Guides

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with Basic Digital Learning Tools and Intermediate-Level Communication Expertise
context.additional_context: A Course for Corporate Managers/Leaders Focused on Deriving Actionable Improvements for Live Work Environments

learning_goals: Learners achieve an 85% or higher task completion rate in a LiveGuide usability test based on given work scenarios.
Learners can comparatively analyze the strengths and weaknesses of two LiveGuide versions through A/B testing, identifying at least three key differences.
Learners can propose three practical improvement strategies applicable to real-world tasks based on test results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
